snippet: Fully 53 percent supported Senator Kirsten E. Gillibrand's re-election, her best showing yet, a survey from Siena College found.
abstract: Fully 53 percent supported Senator Kirsten E. Gillibrand's re-election, her best showing yet, a survey from Siena College found.

headline.main: Gillibrand Favored by Most New York Voters, Poll Finds
